rules_text:
Runeweald Monolith enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
{R}{R}{R}, {T}, Sacrifice Runeweald Monolith: Create a token that's a copy of target artifact you control, except it enters the battlefield with your choice of an additional +1/+1 counter or an additional charge counter on it. Activate this ability only as a sorcery.
